title: Bitcoin Breaks $50K for First Time Since Hitting All-Time High in 2021
description: BTC has gained more than 15% over the past seven days and is now the highest it's been since December 2021.

title: Bitcoin spot ETFs by the numbers: one month later
description: 2024 kicked off to an exhilarating start, with Bitcoin spot ETF approvals on the horizon and the Cryptocurrency market in a clear uptrend as a result. The debut of these new BTC-backed products, however, resulted in a strong, 20% correction in Bitcoin.

title: Is this the time to buy high-potential GameFi cryptos?
description: With bitcoin threatening its yearly high, and the whole of the altcoin space trending upward, is it time to stick a small bet on a couple of gaming cryptos? Beam (BEAM) and Phantasma (SOUL) are two possibilities.

title: Marathon Digital Reportedly Mulling Africa Expansion
description: Bitcoin mining giant Marathon Digital is expanding its business and reportedly exploring Africa as an option.

title: Ripple’s (XRP) Resistance Fail: Why Technicals Suggest Holding Might Be Smarter
description: Dive into the latest developments in Ripple (XRP), from high-stakes transactions and market reactions to technical analysis and the impact of the ongoing SEC lawsuit. Discover how these factors are shaping Ripple's journey in the dynamic world of cryptocurrency.

title: BEAM and KAS Rise This Week Snagging Double-Digit Gains; XMR, FXS, and RON Face Sharp Declines
description: In the past week, bitcoin has risen over 10% and ethereum has seen a growth of more than 7%. Meanwhile, several cryptocurrency assets have posted significant double-digit increases. title: NSW Schools Trial AI Chat App to Enhance Learning
description: Discover the groundbreaking trial of NSWEduChat, an innovative AI chat app designed to enhance learning in NSW schools.

title: Drexel’s Robotics and AI Fusion Sets New Benchmark in Structural Integrity Assurance
description: Researchers at the Drexel University College of Engineering have unveiled a groundbreaking advancement in structural safety inspections, utilizing autonomous robots integrated with state-of-the-art machine learning technology.  This innovative approach promises to enhance the efficiency and accuracy of structural assessments, potentially revolutionizing the maintenance of buildings and infrastructure. title: Polygon Labs Innovates with Type 1 Prover for EVM Chains and ZK Scaling Solutions
description: In an innovative stride towards blockchain scalability and efficiency, Polygon Labs recently unveiled its latest technological breakthrough: the “type 1 prover.”  The pioneering technology stands to revolutionize the way Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) compatible chains integrate zero-knowledge (ZK) scaling solutions, marking a significant leap towards broader adoption of validium networks for proof verification and settlement […]

title: Microsoft’s Future Plans for Xbox Consoles and Game Titles Revealed
description: In recent events, speculation surrounding the future of Xbox consoles and the potential multiplatform release of popular titles has reached a fever pitch. While rumors have swirled online, Microsoft has remained tight-lipped, leaving fans and industry insiders eagerly awaiting official confirmation. However, recent developments hint at a significant shift in strategy for the tech giant. […]

title: Aquanow receives most comprehensive crypto license from Dubai’s virtual asset regulator
description: Dubai’s virtual asset regulator has awarded its 20th VASP ( Virtual asset service provider license) to Canadian based Aquanow. This is considered the most comprehensive license to date as it includes not only a crypto brokerage license but also crypto lending, borrowing and investment.
